headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Appoints Marc Kazlauskas as President of Norwegian Cruise Line
summary: Kazlauskas brings decades of experience leading global travel companies and delivering guest-centric innovation Marc Kazlauskas, President, Norwegian Cruise Line Appointment of Marc Kazlauskas as President, Norwegian Cruise Line MIAMI, Dec. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. (NYSE: NCLH) today named travel industry veteran Marc Kazlauskas as President of Norwegian Cruise Line (Norwegian), effective Jan. 19, 2026. He joins the company with more than 30 years of senio
